ProductInfo.Features:
Offers the power of a Cortex-A9 & quad-core ATM7029 1.6GHz processor.
7 inch IPS Mutitouch Capacitive Screen(1280*800). 4K Video Player: One Screen could support 2 videos play.
0.3MP Front camera, 2.0MP Rear Camera, Super Slim Aluminum shell.
8GB Storage, 1GB RAM. Super slim (as thin as mini iPad) 7.2mm and fashion metal shell design for high quality life.
Package included: 1 x AGPtek tablet,1 x Charger,1 x USB cable,1 x Micro USB to USB(OTG) Cable,1 x AGPtek User Manual, 1 Bluetooth speaker
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® 7" Android 4.1 Quad core 1280*800 IPS HD Screen with 1GB RAM & 8GB Storage Super Slim Wifi tablet With Bluetooth Speaker
